questions.question: It is given that a and b are the roots of the quadratic equation 2x^2 - 10x - 2 = 0 and that a > b. Show that 3a - 2b = -2.
A circle with centre O passes through the points P(-1, 7) and Q(0, 8). (a) State the relationship between the perpendicular bisector of PQ and the point O.
A circle with centre O passes through the points P(-1, 7) and Q(0, 8). (b) Find the coordinates of O, given that the line y = 2x - 2 passes through the centre of the circle.
questions.question_type: Finding coordinates of unknown collinear point

questions.question: A circle with centre O passes through the points P(-1, 7) and Q(0, 8). (c) Hence find the equation of the circle.
questions.question_type: Finding equation of circle and determining if a point lies on, is inside, or outside a circle

questions.question: The polynomial f(x) is given by f(x) = 3x^3 - 9x^2 - 30x - 4. (a) Factorise f(x) completely.
questions.category: Polynomials, cubic equations and partial fractions
questions.question_type: Factor theorem and solving a cubic equation

questions.question: The polynomial f(x) is given by f(x) = 3x^3 - 9x^2 - 30x - 4. (b) Hence, prove that the equation 3x^3 - 9x^2 - 30x - 4 = 0 has only one real root. Find the solution.
questions.category: Polynomials, cubic equations and partial fractions
questions.question_type: Factor theorem and solving a cubic equation

A solid was heated and left to cool in a container in a room. The difference between its temperature and the surrounding room temperature at time t hours was TC°. The table shows some recorded values of t and T. t (hours) 5 10 15 22 25 ( )T癈 15.1 8.4 5.2 2.7 1.6. The variables t and T are related by the equation btT ae= , where a and b are constants.
